name: blocks
description: blocks is a minimalist platfomer designed to be easy to pick up and fun to play. As you progress, the game gets increasingly more difficult, requiring you to master power-ups and timing to win!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 600 MB RAM Graphics: Any GPU or integrated graphics Storage: 300 MB available space
